myExercises.title: My exercises
myExercises.activeProgramsDescription: Below you'll find all your active exercise programs from completed assessments.
myExercises.endedProgramsDescription: Below you will find all programs you have already ended.

1.title: Neurodynamic exercises: what, why, when?
1.description: Ever heard of nerve flossing? If you have pain caused by nerve irritation or compression, nerve flossing is worth a try.

2.title: Preventing back pain at work
2.description: Tips for proper sitting, ergonomic workspace setup and exercises you can do during the work day.

3.title: Stretching for a healthy spine
3.description: A simple stretching routine to keep your spine healthy and flexible.

4.title: Exercise and nutrition
4.description: How proper nutrition aids recovery and strengthens the back muscles.

5.title: Common exercise mistakes
5.description: Avoid these common errors that can worsen back pain instead of easing it.

6.title: Rehabilitation exercises after injury
6.description: Recommended practices and exercises for rehabilitation after spinal injury or surgery.

assessment.title: Pain assessment
assessment.subtitle: Fill the questionnaire to get personalized exercise recommendations

cookie.message: This site uses cookies to enhance your experience. By using our site, you agree to our cookie policy.

favoriteExercises.title: Favourite exercises
favoriteExercises.empty: You have no favourite exercises yet. Mark the star next to exercises in your plan to add them.

savedBlogs.title: Saved articles
savedBlogs.empty: You have no saved articles yet. Save articles in the Blog section using the "Add to favourites" button.

generalProgram.title: General program
generalProgram.needMore: You need at least 2 assessments (you have {{count}})
generalProgram.hint: Fill in more pain questionnaires to create a personalized program
generalProgram.description: No time for individual exercise programs? Here's a personalized plan with the most important exercises from your current programs.

banner.message: A new week, a new challenge! Don't postpone your exercises and start today üèãÔ∏è

mood.infoText: Average score from the last {{days}} days is based on your daily mood entries. The closer your score is to 3, the better.
mood.infoFollow: Watch how your overall score changes over time.
mood.better: Better trend in the last {{days}} days
mood.worse: Worse trend in the last {{days}} days

results.title: Assessment results
results.subtitle: Thank you for completing the MSK Pain Navigator
results.painAnalysis: We analyzed your answers regarding pain in {area}
results.exercisePlanDescription: Based on your assessment, we have prepared a personalized exercise program specifically designed for your condition. Please note that this assessment does not replace professional medical help. For a complete diagnosis and treatment plan, please consult with a healthcare professional.
results.disclaimer: This assessment does not replace professional medical help. For a complete diagnosis and treatment plan, please consult with a healthcare professional.
results.resultsSaved: ‚úî Results have been automatically saved. You can find them in the 'My exercises' section.

exercisePlan.title: Your exercise plan
exercisePlan.generalDescription: Personalized program with the most important exercises from your programs. Follow the instructions and stop exercising if you feel pain.
exercisePlan.specificDescription: Exercises specific for {diagnosis} in the {area} area. Follow the instructions and stop exercising if you feel pain.
exercisePlan.whyNotGood: Why is the exercise not good?
exercisePlan.hasPain: Do you feel pain during the exercise?
exercisePlan.wantChange: Do you want to change this exercise?
exercisePlan.exercisesNotFoundDescription: For your combination of diagnosis ({{diagnosis}}) and pain area ({{area}}), we don't have specific exercises. Please consult with a physiotherapist.
exercisePlan.generalNotAvailableDescription: You don't have enough assessments to create a general program or there are no exercises with defined importance available.
exercisePlan.importantNoticeText: These exercises serve only as general recommendations and do not replace a visit to a physiotherapist or doctor. If you experience increased pain, stop exercising.
exercisePlan.exerciseChangeRequested: Exercise change request has been sent.

followUp.progressRecordedDescription: Your answers have been successfully saved
followUp.question: Question {current} of {total}
followUp.thankYou: Thank you for completing the progress questionnaire.

emptyState.noAssessments: You don't have any saved assessments yet.
